DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass whether dietary fiber-enriched cereal effect postprandial glucose level plasma glucagon-like peptide 1 ( GLP-1 ) and/or glucose-dependent insulinotropic polypeptide ( GIP ) concentration patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dietary Fiber-enriched Cereals Glycemic Control Secretion Gut Hormones
DOC.detailed_description: Fifteen subject type 2 diabetes mellitus provide study meal base either dietary fiber-enriched cereal conventional cereal upon two separate admission cross-over fashion . The study meal provide 6 p.m. 10 p.m. day admission , 8 a.m. next day . A hamburger coke mixed meal give lunch noon second day . Blood sample do every 30 minute 8 a.m. 4 p.m. second day . The plasma level glucose , GLP-1 , GIP , insulin , glucagon , free fatty acid measure .
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes mellitus HbA1c 6.5~8.5 % life style modification metformin monotherapy time screen sulfonylurea insulin therapy time screen allergy wheat , flour , cereal nut lactose intolerance pregnancy / lactation
